title: Ep. 210: Very Special Episode: Clutter-Busting!
description:
Elizabeth reveals the clutter-busting ideas from Gretchen’s book “Outer Order, Inner Calm” that work best to help curb her natural messiness, and we discuss Know Yourself Better questions related to clutter.
Get in touch on Instagram: @GretchenRubin & @LizCraft
Get the resources and all links related to this episode here: http://happiercast.com/210
Get the podcast show notes by email every week here: http://gretchenrubin.com/#newsletter

If you pre-ordered Gretchen’s new book Outer Order, Inner Calm, get your preorder bonuses here: http://outerorderinnercalmbook.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
